project.name: C-C609A-GREP-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C609A-GREP-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive This weakness expects a string in the form: '<qsize> <file1> <file2> <data>' where qsize is the size of the quick sort (used to delay execution in certain benign cases), file1 and file2 are files to be read (also to delay execution), and data is a string containing no spaces. It does a double checked lock which can allow a second thread to return an uninitialized struct while the first thread is in the process of initialization, leading to a null pointer dereference.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 3859 -s 120 -m "5 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo2 /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/fifo1 a1s2d3f4" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
